mapper.select: select c.name as 'clazz', count(*) as 'count' from student s join clazz c on s.clazz_id = c.id group by s.clazz_id

select CASE student.degree WHEN 1 THEN '初中' WHEN 2 THEN '高中' WHEN 3 THEN '大专' WHEN 4 THEN '本科' WHEN 5 THEN '硕士' WHEN 6 THEN '博士' ELSE '未知' END AS name, count(*) as 'value' from student group by student.degree
